content:
I reverted that change ‚¨ÜÔ∏è  Some concern was raised that `priorityFeePerGas` doesn't reflect it's a `max` value. If we change it to `maxPriorityFeePerGas`, then we are back to using 2/3 of the terms from the spec directly (incl. `baseFeePerGas`) and we should probably use 3/3 to be consistent. 

OTOH, those terms are verbose and that was one of the reason noted by geth against them in their original writeup and why they proposed `gasFeeCap` & `gasTipCap` ‚ôªÔ∏è 

We _can_ discuss this on ACD this Friday, but my fear is we end up taking a bunch of time on the call going in circle, so if anyone has ideas about how to "unblock" this, I'm all ears. 

In the meantime, <@!104006934562107392> has a PR for the JSON RPC spec changes: https://github.com/ethereum/eth1.0-specs/pull/47#pullrequestreview-656816106 the format should be relatively final, but the naming obviously may still change.
